summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to attorney Gloria Allred, requesting a quick call to ask questions related to the Epstein case. It indicates ongoing investigation or communication between prosecutors and a prominent attorney involved in the case.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Recipient of an email from a federal prosecutor requesting a call to discuss questions related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email requesting a call with Gloria Allred to ask questions about the Epstein case, based in the Southern District of New York.

connections.description: Prosecutor reaching out to attorney Gloria Allred to discuss the Epstein case, indicating official investigative contact.

events.title: Prosecutor Contact with Gloria Allred
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails Gloria Allred requesting a call to ask questions related to the Epstein case.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: As of May 2020, federal prosecutors in the Southern District of New York were actively investigating the Epstein case and reaching out to attorney Gloria Allred.
The communication shows ongoing official interest in gathering information related to the Epstein case from a prominent attorney known for representing victims.
The email indicates that the investigation was still active and seeking information well after Epstein's 2019 arrest and death.
